message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.CV 

This paper is about a context-aware neural machine translation model that improves translation coherence by taking into account extra-sentential information. Therefore, it is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-categories of Computational Linguistics (cs.CL), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), and Machine Learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the model uses attention mechanisms to analyze the flow of information from the extended context to the translation model, which suggests it could also belong to the Neural and Evolutionary Computing (cs.NE) sub-category. Finally, the paper experiments with an English-Russian subtitles dataset, which could also place it in the Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (cs.CV) sub-category.
